category.name: Iteration 2 requirements but only Follows and Parent relationships

id.comment: Which while statement follows statment in line 3

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows(3, w)

id.comment: Which while statement follows statement in line 4

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows(4, w)

id.comment: Which statement is followed by statement in line 19

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 19)

id.comment: Which statement is the parent of statement in line 9

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 9)

id.comment: Which while statement is the parent of statement in line 11

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent(w, 11)

id.comment: Which assign statement is the parent of statement in line 3

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent(a, 3)

id.comment: Which while statements are the parent of some assignment statement

query.querystr: while w; assign a; Select w such that Parent(w, a)

id.comment: Is line 4 the parent of line 9
Is there any while statement that is the child of statement in line 4

query.querystr: while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Parent(4, w)

id.comment: Which are the assign statements that are the children of the statment in line 11

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent(11, a)
stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s, 19)
assign a; Select a such that Follows(a, 19)
